string.name: help_para1
string.div:
Welcome to Aakash Programmming Lab(apl) 

 Aakash Programming Lab has C, C++, Python and Scilab as programming languages.

string.name: help_para2
string.div: Within each programming console, a detailed documentation along with reference manual, has been provided. To read the documentation, click on Option button.

string.name: help_para3
string.div: This will pop an option Menu-Bar. Click Help for detailed help.

resources.string:
Aakash Programming Lab(APL) provides a simple and easy to use programming environment to students. Please check help for more details. Design and developed at IIT Bombay. 
 
Version: 1.1 
 
Repository: https://github.com/androportal/APL-apk 
 
License: GNU GPL, version-3, 29 June 2007 
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt 
Copyright Â© 2012, IIT Bombay
Host is not reachable, download apl.tar.gz from http://www.google.com
